name: ocw-scraper
description: Scrapes information from Open CourseWare (ocw) websites

scripts.run: npx babel src --out-dir dist && node dist/app.js
scripts.deploy: npx babel src --out-dir dist && gcloud beta functions deploy ocwScraper --trigger-http
scripts.push-to-git: git add . && git commit -m 'Modified data queries to join subject & school info'

author: Mike Dane
